title: Three Bedroom Apartment for Sale at Royal Park
details:
- Royal Park Apartments, Lake Drive, Rajagiriya.

- Three bedroom, two bathroom. [Fully renovated bathrooms]

- Fully furnished with imported furniture and mahogany flooring.

- 1400 sq/ft.

- Separate servants room & bath room with service entrance.

- Common facilities include: Swimming Pool, Gym, Squash Court, Function Room, Mini Market & 24 Hour Security.

- Price is negotiable upon inspection. Genuine buyers only, no agents.
